about.title: About the Project
about.text: Sea turtles are vital to marine ecosystems. In Kaş, we use photo-identification to study and protect them.

help.title: How You Can Help
help.text: Take photos or videos of turtles from any side or above, but always keep a safe distance.

cheekprint.title: Turtle Cheekprint ID
cheekprint.text: Each turtle has a unique facial pattern, which allows us to recognize individuals and track their movements.
